TopicTitle: Where is the Hubmax for SR size?

Articles.Content:
I want a Hubmax that's scaled up from the standard size to the sr docking port size, but I can't find one. I thought that some of the various parts packs might have something, but call me crazy, I just really want a "stock" Hubmax in XXL size

Someone showed me how to create new parts by modding config files, can that same technique be used to scale up the stock part?
Yep, just copy the hubs part.cfg file, change the name= line in the copy so the two parts don't clash, then change (or add) the rescaleFactor = 2
It'd probably help to change the flavor text down in the editor section a bit as well, so you can tell them apart in the VAB/SPH side window
Yep, I modded it up something like "Sr HubMax" "At the 5th annual... " Works great. Thanks again
